divs: Sighting Detailsdecieded to go out side for a cig,hubby came out stood by the fence and said very excited come here and look at this,when i looked there were bright lights,following each other in the sky,quite low down and there was no noise,diddnt know what they were,was amazed when we seen them,both saying we never seen anything like it before,by the time we realized to get the camera most of them had dissapeared into the distance,why my husband was taking photos,i rang my friend round the corner to see if they could see them and they seen the last couple,before they dissapeared into the distance
